title: Game replay controls and layout overflow on mobile
description:
On mobile viewports (~375px), the game replay page has several overflow issues:

1. The playback scrubber/progress bar extends beyond the viewport — the slider and frame counter (e.g. '68 / 132') are clipped off the right edge.
2. The player header line (name, model ID, cost, Elo, life, library) wraps awkwardly with pieces like 'Life 20 | Lib 49' breaking across lines.
3. A horizontal scrollbar appears at the bottom of the page.

The game log panel correctly moves below the game board on mobile, but the controls bar needs responsive treatment — possibly stacking the scrubber below the buttons, or making the frame counter smaller.
